channel.title: Analog on Joshua Mauldin
channel.description: Recent content in Analog on Joshua Mauldin

item.title: Skull004
item.description: Experiment in integrating a blackout skull with a vintage 1900s typewriter and its articulating keys. My cat wanted in on the photo, who am I to say no?

item.title: Skull002a
item.description: Experiment in applying an iron oxide coating to a resin skull, then letting it rust. I also rusted the nails in a solution of vinegar and hydrogen peroxide.

item.title: Skull003
item.description: Experiment with blackout paint, second only to VantaBlack in terms of light blocking. The bottom shows a several second HDR exposure, which is how long it took to register the light.

item.title: Skull000a
item.description: Sometimes I fix watches. Sometimes they explode on me. So this is an experiment with 1950s timepiece that didn’t get fixed. I integrated its parts into a skull. A memento mori.

item.title: Skull001
item.description: Bright red companion piece to the first timepiece skull, also a memento mori.

item.title: Skull006
item.description: Experiment with unicorn skeleton and color-sensitive paint.
